definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Last year's cereal harvest in Niger was 26 percent below the previous year.
sentences.chinese: 去年，尼日尔谷物产量比前一年偏低26%。

sentences.english: Drought and poor harvests led to a food crisis in Niger.
sentences.chinese: 尼日尔则因为旱灾和粮食歉收正面临粮食危机。

sentences.english: Regarding the “institutions which, in Niger, said there was a famine”.
sentences.chinese: 关于“在尼日尔的一些机构说有饥荒”一事。

sentences.english: The group is doing research in  Niger.
sentences.chinese: 该组织正在尼日尔进行研究。

sentences.english: But in Niger many farmers plant trees to protect their crops.
sentences.chinese: 但在尼日尔，许多农民种植树木来保护庄稼。

sentences.english: Personal protective equipment has been procured for Nigeria and Niger.
sentences.chinese: 已经为尼日利亚和尼日尔采购了个人防护装备。

sentences.english: Niger was already in bad shape before the floods started in early August.
sentences.chinese: 尼日尔在八月初遭受洪水侵袭前，情况就已不容乐观。

sentences.english: Niger has uranium and is a potential big oil exporter as well.
sentences.chinese: 尼日尔拥有铀矿，同时还是潜在的石油输出大国。

sentences.english: Niger's Information Minister said the UN officials were ill-intentioned.
sentences.chinese: 尼日尔信息部长称，联合国官员居心不良。

sentences.english: "All of us are Nigeriens, " he says.
Niger is the worlds largest exporter of uranium.
sentences.chinese: 尼日尔是世界上最大的铀输出国。

sentences.english: Government in Niger have attacked the main prison in the capital Niamey.
sentences.chinese: 尼日尔政府袭击了首都尼亚美的主要监狱。

sentences.english: Al-Saadi Gaddafi was in the latest convoy which has crossed into Niger.
sentences.chinese: 萨阿迪跟随最新的车队穿越边境进入尼日尔境内。

sentences.english: Niger often has severe dry periods.
sentences.chinese: 尼日尔经常有严重的干旱期。
尼日尔非洲中西部国家。

sentences.english: Libyans fleeing the conflict with their families and crossing the border into Niger.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚人与家人逃离冲突，穿过边境进入尼日尔。

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
